headline: Is Brian Armstrong's $1 Million BTC Prediction by 2030 Unrealistic?
summary: While Brian Armstrong's $1 million Bitcoin price target by 2030 may sound sensational, his bull thesis is grounded in powerful market dynamics. Additionally, from a historical and mathematical perspective, Armstrong's prediction is achievable.

raw.headline: Is Brian Armstrong's $1 Million BTC Prediction by 2030 Unrealistic?
raw.summary: While Brian Armstrong's $1 million Bitcoin price target by 2030 may sound sensational, his bull thesis is grounded in powerful market dynamics. Additionally, from a historical and mathematical perspective, Armstrong's prediction is achievable.

headline: VanEck Crypto Monthly Recap For September 2025
summary: Most tokens finished September lower, with 23 of 35 major assets declining as late-month selloffs erased earlier gains. Read more here.

headline: Bitcoin price surges to all-time high above $125,000
summary: Bitcoin's price set an all-time high of $125,700 on October 5, clearing the previous bitcoin price record high from August.

raw.headline: Bitcoin price surges to all-time high above $125,000
raw.summary: Bitcoin's price set an all-time high of $125,700 on October 5, clearing the previous bitcoin price record high from August.

headline: Bitcoin Sets New All-Time High Over $125,000, Surpassing August Record
summary: Bitcoin reached a new all-time high in October, surpassing previous records and signaling renewed strength in the crypto market.

raw.headline: Bitcoin Sets New All-Time High Over $125,000, Surpassing August Record
